+ *
+ *   boolean a, b;
+ *   Foo c, d, e;

+ *   e = (a || b) ? c : d; // OK

+ *   e = (a && false) ? c : d; // violation, can be simplified to false
+ *   e = (a && b) ? c : d; // OK
+ *
+ * }
